sen.j: 新田部皇女（にいたべのひめみこ、生年不詳 - 文武天皇3年9月25日 (旧暦)（699年10月23日））は天智天皇の皇女。
sen.e: Nitabe no himemiko (year of birth unknown, died on October 26, 699) was a princess of the Emperor Tenmu.
sen.cmt: 文武天皇3年9月25日：西暦699年10月26日となるようです。
sen.e: Nitabe no himemiko (year of birth unknown - October 26, 699) was a princess of the Emperor Tenchi.
sen.cmt: カッコ内を修正しました。Tenmu→Tenchi と修正しました。
sen.e: Nitabe no himemiko (year of birth unknown - October 26, 699) was a princess of the Emperor Tenchi.

sen.j: 母は橘娘（父：阿倍内麻呂）。
sen.e: Her mother was Tachibana no iratsume (whose father was ABE no Uchimaro).
Her mother was Tachibana no iratsume (whose father was ABE no Uchimaro).
Her mother was Tachibana no iratsume (whose father was ABE no Uchimaro).

sen.j: 同母の姉に明日香皇女。
sen.e: Her older maternal half-sister was Asuka no himemiko (Princess Asuka).
Her older sister-uterine was Asuka no himemiko (the Princess Asuka).
sen.cmt: maternal half-sister→sister-uterine と修正しました。the を補いました。
sen.e: Her older sister-uterine was Asuka no himemiko (the Princess Asuka).

sen.j: 699年に死亡した時、葬儀には皇族・臣下および百官の人々が参列する様にと勅があった。
sen.e: When she died in 699, an imperial edict ordering imperial family members, vassals and all the officials to attend her funeral was issued.
When she died in 699, an imperial edict ordered that the Imperial Family members, the vassals and all the officials to attend her funeral.
sen.cmt: the を補いました。imperial family→Imperial Family と修正しました。よりスムースに修正しました。
sen.e: When she died in 699, an imperial edict ordered that the Imperial Family members, the vassals and all the officials to attend her funeral.
